entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
